tools.name: git_status
tools.description: Get the current status of a git repository

tools.name: git_log
tools.description: Get the commit history of a git repository

tools.name: git_diff
tools.description: Show changes between commits, commit and working tree, etc.

tools.name: git_branch
tools.description: List branches or get the current branch name
